column5: Am heading to Snake Bay south of Sioux Narrows in late June and would like any information on methods and locations for smallies and walleyes in the Whitefish, Yellow Girl, Long Bay areas. GPS coordinates would be great. Any other locations in the Southeast section would be appreciated. Thanks in advance. Tight lines.
Try Shad Raps in crawdad or chartreuse. Last year they couldn't resist a crawdad lure. Good luck.
